about_the_game:
• SURVIVAL
- Regardless of the game mode, Bandits is about survival. Monitoring your thirst and hunger is a top priority in both Zone War and Open World.

  • CRAFTING
- While the crafting system in Zone War is limited, the Open World offers a large variety of crafting and customization for players to express themselves while getting lost in the world of Bandits.

  • BUILDING
-At this time base building is only available in the Open World mode. If you enjoy building your own base or coming together with friends to create then then the building system is perfect for you!

  • LOOT
- With an ever expanding pool of loot available in the world, bandits is sure to keep your pockets stuffed!

  • GUN PLAY
- This game focuses on bare bones gun play so even the beginner can sit down and have a good time!

  • ALONE OR TOGETHER
- Are you more of the lone wolf warrior type? Great! Or are you more of the "where the homies at" type of player? That's awesome too! Bandits has single player and online PVP/CO-OP right out the box with plans for dedicated servers coming in the future for our open world!!

content_descriptors.notes: There are cartoon and stylized drug references as well as cartoon and stylized violence.
